maya/scripts/AEbeastTargetTemplate.py

import pymel.core
import pymel.core.general

class AEbeastTargetTemplate(pymel.core.ui.AETemplate):
        def __init__(self, nodeName):
                self.beginScrollLayout()
                self.addControl("targetType", label="Target Type", changeCommand=self.targetTypeChanged)
                self.addSeparator()
                # Texture properties
                self.beginLayout("Texture",collapse=0)
                self.addControl("bakeUVSet", label="Default Bake UV Set")
                self.addControl("atlasTarget", label="Atlas Target", changeCommand=self.onAtlasChanged)
                self.addControl("textureResolution", label="Max Texture Resolution")
                self.addControl("atlasPadding", label="Atlas Padding")
                self.addControl("atlasRescale", label="Atlas Rescale", changeCommand=self.onAtlasRescaleChanged)
                self.addControl("atlasThreshold", label="Rescale Freq. Threshold")
                self.endLayout()
                # Filter properties
                self.beginLayout("World Space Filter", collapse=0)
                self.addControl("enableDirectFilter", label="Filter Direct Illumination", changeCommand=self.onEnableDirectFilterChanged)
                self.addControl("directFilterSize", label="Filter Size")
                self.addControl("directFilterNormalDev", label="Normal Deviation")
                self.addSeparator()
                self.addControl("enableIndirectFilter", label="Filter Indirect Illumination", changeCommand=self.onEnableIndirectFilterChanged)
                self.addControl("indirectFilterSize", label="Filter Size")
                self.addControl("indirectFilterNormalDev", label="Normal Deviation")
                self.addSeparator()
                self.addControl("enableOtherFilter", label="Filter Other Data", changeCommand=self.onEnableOtherFilterChanged)
                self.addControl("otherFilterSize", label="Filter Size")
                self.addControl("otherFilterNormalDev", label="Normal Deviation")
                self.endLayout()
                # Pass properties
                self.callCustom(self.onPassDisplayNew, self.onPassDisplayUpdate, "passes")
                # Base template for ObjectSet
                pymel.core.mel.AEobjectSetNoScroll(nodeName)
                self.suppress("uniqueID")
                self.addExtraControls()
                self.endScrollLayout()

        def targetTypeChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "atlasTarget", node.targetType.get() == 1)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "bakeUVSet", node.targetType.get() == 1)
                self.onAtlasChanged(nodeName)

        def onAtlasChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "textureResolution", node.targetType.get() == 1 or node.atlasTarget.get() == 0)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "atlasPadding", node.targetType.get() == 1 or node.atlasTarget.get() == 0)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "atlasRescale", node.targetType.get() == 1 or node.atlasTarget.get() == 0)
                self.onAtlasRescaleChanged(nodeName)

        def onAtlasRescaleChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, "atlasThreshold", node.targetType.get() == 1 or node.atlasTarget.get() == 0 or node.atlasRescale.get() == 0)

        def onEnableFilterChanged(self, nodeName, component, dim):
                self.dimControl(nodeName, component + "FilterSize", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, component + "FilterShape", dim)
                self.dimControl(nodeName, component + "FilterNormalDev", dim)

        def onEnableDirectFilterChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                dim = node.enableDirectFilter.get() == 0
                self.onEnableFilterChanged(nodeName, "direct", dim)

        def onEnableIndirectFilterChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                dim = node.enableIndirectFilter.get() == 0
                self.onEnableFilterChanged(nodeName, "indirect", dim)

        def onEnableOtherFilterChanged(self, nodeName):
                node = pymel.core.general.PyNode(nodeName)
                dim = node.enableOtherFilter.get() == 0
                self.onEnableFilterChanged(nodeName, "other", dim)

        def onPassDisplayNew(self, attrStr):
                self.ctrls = []
                # create controls
                pymel.core.windows.setUITemplate("attributeEditorTemplate", pushTemplate=True)
                self.ctrls.append(pymel.core.windows.frameLayout(label="Passes", collapse=0))
                pymel.core.windows.columnLayout(adjustableColumn=True)
                self.createPassDropDown()
                self.createPassTextList()
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..")
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..")
                pymel.core.windows.setUITemplate(popTemplate=True)
                self.onPassDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def createPassDropDown(self):
                pymel.core.windows.rowLayout(numberOfColumns=2, adjustableColumn=1, columnAttach2=("right", "left"), columnAlign=(2, "center"))
                self.passMenuGrp = pymel.core.windows.optionMenuGrp(label="Add Pass")
                #pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label="defaultBeastTextureTarget")
                self.newPassButton = pymel.core.windows.button(label="New Pass", width=80, height=20)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent("..")

        def createPassTextList(self):
                self.passList = pymel.core.windows.textScrollList(allowMultiSelection=True, height=100, doubleClickCommand=self.onDoubleClickPass)
                self.removePassButton = pymel.core.windows.button(label="Remove")

        def onPassDisplayUpdate(self, attrStr):
                self.populatePassMenu(attrStr)
                self.populatePassList(attrStr)

        def populatePassMenu(self, attrStr):
                self.emptyPassMenu()
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                targetNode = attr.node()
                allPasses = pymel.core.general.ls(type="beastPass")
                connectedPasses = pymel.core.general.listConnections(str(targetNode) + ".passes")
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(self.passMenuGrp)
                for p in allPasses:
                        if p not in connectedPasses:
                                pymel.core.windows.menuItem(label=p)
                self.passMenuGrp.changeCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onAddPass, attrStr))
                self.newPassButton.setCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onNewPass, attrStr))

        def emptyPassMenu(self):
                listOfMenuItems = pymel.core.windows.optionMenuGrp(self.passMenuGrp, query=True, itemListLong=True)
                pymel.core.windows.setParent(str(self.passMenuGrp) + "|OptionMenu", menu=True)
                for item in listOfMenuItems:
                        pymel.core.windows.deleteUI(item, menuItem=True)

        def onAddPass(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                targetNode = attr.node()
                passes = pymel.core.general.listConnections(str(targetNode) + ".passes")
                p = self.passMenuGrp.getValue()
                if p in passes:
                        return
                # connect pass and target
                passNode = pymel.core.PyNode(p)
                passNode.targets.connect(targetNode.passes, nextAvailable=True) 
                self.onPassDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def onNewPass(self, attrStr):
                passNode = pymel.core.general.createNode("beastPass", skipSelect=True)
                print "Created new Beast pass:", passNode
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                targetNode = attr.node()
                passNode.targets.connect(targetNode.passes, nextAvailable=True)
                self.onPassDisplayUpdate(attrStr)
        
        def populatePassList(self, attrStr):
                self.passList.removeAll()
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                node = attr.node()
                passes = pymel.core.general.listConnections(str(node) + ".passes")
                self.passList.append(passes)
                self.passList.deleteKeyCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onRemovePass, attrStr))
                self.removePassButton.setCommand(pymel.core.Callback(self.onRemovePass, attrStr))

        def onRemovePass(self, attrStr):
                attr = pymel.core.general.Attribute(attrStr)
                targetNode = attr.node()
                selectedPasses = self.passList.getSelectItem()
                for p in selectedPasses:
                        passNode = pymel.core.PyNode(p)
                        passNode.targets.disconnect(targetNode.passes, nextAvailable=True)
                self.onPassDisplayUpdate(attrStr)

        def onDoubleClickPass(self):
                selectedPasses = self.passList.getSelectItem()
                if len(selectedPasses) > 0:
                        pymel.core.mel.showEditor(selectedPasses[0])
